short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Helps you find out what hosting provider a website is using.
short.de: Hilft Ihnen herauszufinden, welchen Hosting-Anbieter eine Website nutzt.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you find out what hosting provider a website is using.

**Features**

 - A click on the extension icon in the toolbar, redirects you to a hosting report of the website you are currently visiting
 - Adds an entry in the context menu
